title: Blended Methodology-Based Instructional Design for Transitioning to Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: No online learning experience, holds beginner-level expertise in the field
context.additional_context: Project-based learning utilizing digital devices for learner groups comprising professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can design effective project-based learning activities in an online educational environment
Learners can analyze challenges in the transition to online education using a mixed-methods approach (surveys + interviews)
Learners can develop strategies to promote peer collaboration and knowledge sharing using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
